definition: having the back and shoulders rounded
details:
adjective
- having the back and shoulders rounded
= example: having the back and shoulders rounded
= synonyms: hunched
- irregular in shape or outline
= example: irregular in shape or outline
= synonyms: asymmetrical
- having or marked by bends or angles
= example: having or marked by bends or angles
- not straight, morally dubious
= example: not straight, morally dubious
= synonyms: corrupt
